name: Gun Warrior: The Rider From Nowhere
summary: Gun Warrior is a 3D first-person shooter with an Old West setting. The player takes control of Cole Tilghman, once a feared gunman. When an unknown gunfighter kills his brother, he returns to take him out along with the henchmen. The game consists of different missions in locations such as a town or a train. There are animated cut-scenes between missions with voice acting and often killed enemies will trigger a cinematic death sequence.
